property_management.title: Property Management
property_management.description: Professional and efficient management for communities and demanding owners.
property_management.text: We are property managers in Tenerife, certified and specialized technicians in all types of communities. We have a team of highly qualified professionals with proven experience in property management.

services.title: Accounting
services.description: We guarantee transparent and efficient management of financial resources. We handle the preparation of balance sheets, budgets, and settlements, always ensuring maximum clarity and compliance with current regulations.

services.title: Suppliers
services.description: We manage and coordinate all suppliers necessary for the proper functioning of your community. From maintenance to specialized services, we ensure the selection and supervision of the best professionals, guaranteeing quality, efficiency, and compliance in every job performed.

services.title: Meeting Preparation
services.description: We take care of the preparation and organization of homeowners' meetings, ensuring clear and timely convocations. We manage the creation of the agenda, the necessary documentation, and the correct drafting of minutes, thus facilitating effective communication and a quick and transparent decision-making process.

services.title: Community Visits
services.description: We conduct periodic visits to communities to supervise the condition of facilities and resolve any issues quickly and efficiently. Our constant attention ensures the smooth operation and safety of your property, offering personalized solutions based on the needs of each community.

services.title: Advisory Services
services.description: We provide specialized legal advice on issues such as drafting and updating bylaws and horizontal division regulations. We ensure compliance with current legislation and offer legal solutions to resolve any conflicts or doubts that may arise within your community.

services.title: Document Custody
services.description: We handle the secure custody and management of all your community’s documentation, ensuring its preservation and access when needed. We guarantee that the documents are organized efficiently, complying with legal regulations and facilitating easy consultation at any time.

services.title: Insurance Mediators
services.description: We act as mediators to resolve any conflicts between the community, owners, and insurance companies in an amicable and effective manner. We serve as impartial intermediaries, facilitating communication and helping to find fair solutions that promote the well-being and harmony of the community.

services.title: Budget Preparation and Financial Planning
services.description: We assist the community in planning its expenses and preparing annual budgets in order to optimize resources.

phrases: Your community in expert hands.
Hassle-free management with complete confidence.

vacation_rentals.title: Vacation Rentals
vacation_rentals.description: Turn your property into a source of income effortlessly.
vacation_rentals.text: We manage your vacation rental property in Tenerife comprehensively, ensuring an excellent experience for both owners and guests. Trust us to optimize your investment and provide unforgettable stays.

services.title: Property Advertising and Promotion
services.description: Listing on rental platforms (Airbnb, Booking, etc.) and promotion through social media and other channels.

services.title: Reservation Management
services.description: Coordinating bookings, confirmations, and cancellations, ensuring maximum occupancy.

services.title: Guest Reception and Welcome
services.description: Check-in and check-out of guests, providing local information and ensuring a great first impression.

services.title: Cleaning and Maintenance
services.description: Professional cleaning services between stays and general maintenance to keep the property in optimal condition.

services.title: 24/7 Customer Support
services.description: Continuous support for guests, resolving any issues or concerns during their stay.

services.title: Payment and Billing Management
services.description: Managing payments, collections, and issuing invoices, ensuring transparency and security.

services.title: Rate Optimization
services.description: Dynamic pricing analysis and adjustments based on demand, season, and competition to maximize revenue.

services.title: Local Tax Management
services.description: We help property owners comply with local taxes related to vacation rentals, such as tourism taxes, licenses, or usage fees. Managing payment and filing of tax returns.

phrases: Let your property generate income for you.
We handle everything so you can enjoy the benefits.

vehicle_procedures.title: Vehicle Procedures
vehicle_procedures.description: We handle everything related to your vehicle quickly and safely.
vehicle_procedures.text: At GestoFinca, we know that car procedures can be a headache. That’s why we’re here to make it easy. We handle the entire process for you, from start to finish, with no hassle or wasted time. We carry out all procedures related to your vehicle and the DGT. OFFICIALLY AUTHORIZED BY THE DGT.

services.title: Vehicle Ownership Transfer
services.description: We manage the ownership change quickly and securely, meeting all legal requirements.

services.title: Purchase and Sale Contracts
services.description: We draft clear and valid contracts so you can buy or sell with complete peace of mind.

services.title: Payment of Taxes and Transfer Fees
services.description: We take care of tax payments and filings so you don’t have to worry about fiscal matters.

services.title: Vehicle Registration
services.description: We handle the full registration process for both new and imported vehicles.

services.title: Vehicle Deregistration and Registration
services.description: We manage all temporary or permanent vehicle registrations and deregistrations with the DGT.

services.title: Vehicle Reports
services.description: We request official reports so you know the legal and technical status of a vehicle before buying.

services.title: Duplicate Circulation Permit
services.description: We process duplicates in case of loss, theft, or damage to the original permit.

services.title: Special Circulation Permits
services.description: We manage specific permits for driving in exceptional situations or with special vehicles.

phrases: Agency officially authorized by the DGT.
We take care of everything—just enjoy the ride.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.intro: At GestoFinca, we use cookies to enhance our users' browsing experience. This page aims to inform you about how and why we use cookies on our website.

section1.title: 1. What are cookies?
section1.text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device. They allow the website to remember your actions and preferences over time.

section2.title: 2. Types of cookies we use
list: Necessary cookies: Essential for the website to function properly.
Performance cookies: Help us measure and improve site performance.
Functional cookies: Remember your preferences for a better experience.
Advertising cookies: Provide more relevant ads and limit repetition.

section3.title: 3. How to control cookies?
section3.text1: You can manage cookies through your browser settings.
section3.text2: For more information, check your browser’s help section or websites about cookie management.

section4.title: 4. Consent
section4.text: By browsing our website, you agree to our use of cookies. Otherwise, adjust your settings or stop using the site.

section5.title: 5. Changes to the cookie policy
section5.text: We reserve the right to update this cookie policy. Changes will be published here with the last update date.

section6.title: 6. Contact
section6.text: For questions about our cookie policy, contact us via the methods on our contact page.
